name: Kanten Senmyou Blessing
description:
The Cryo Elemental Infusion created by your Kamisato Ayaka, who has this card equipped, allows the character to which it is attached to deal +1 Cryo DMG.
When you switch to Kamisato Ayaka, who has this card equipped: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
(You must have Kamisato Ayaka in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

(Once per Round)\n(You must have $[A1105] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

(Once per Round)\n(You must have Kamisato Ayaka in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
storytext: The heron holds upon the ice on elegant wing.
source: Reward for inviting Kamisato Ayaka to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
